data.message: Its the exact same commercial every year I think its time you did a new one what a joke its so old and tired looking I used to be so excited to see this add but now the magic has just gone

replies.message:
That’s the point...
It should never change. That advert will go down in history as being the Christmas advert that everyone waits for year on year. It created so much excitement for me as a kid and will continue to do so for generations to come 👍👍
I mean fair play they've had this since the 90s but... like... they could at least try and make it a little more remastered
Aaron Culbertson if its not broke why fix it?
